quizzes

Class Quiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • quizzes.Quiz
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FifthGradeQuiz, FirstGradeQuiz, FourthGradeQuiz, SecondGradeQuiz, ThirdGradeQuiz

    public abstract class Quiz
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class that all quiz classes use.
